Package suga.engine.sound

Class JavaxSoundManager

java.lang.Object
suga.engine.sound.JavaxSoundManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
SoundManager
public class JavaxSoundManager extends Object implements SoundManager
The JavaxSoundManager is a SoundManager that outputs sound using the classes provided by javax and javax.sampled.

  • Method Details

    • findClip

      protected Clip findClip(String path)
      Attempts to find the clip in the resource path, and if not found searches the local disk.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to attempt and find the clip at.
      Returns:
      Either the found clip or null.

    • clearSounds

      public void clearSounds()
      Clears the list of sounds currently loaded by the SoundManager. Should be called before loading a new scene to prevent too many files from being stored in RAM.
      Specified by:
      clearSounds in interface SoundManager

    • addSoundEffect

      public boolean addSoundEffect(String name, String path)
      Adds a new sound effect to the sound manager which can then be played upon request.
      Specified by:
      addSoundEffect in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the sound effect.
      path - The path to the sound effect. The system will first search class resources then the local disk.
      Returns:
      True if the effect is found and then added to the SoundManager. Otherwise, false.

    • removeSoundEffect

      public void removeSoundEffect(String name)
      Removes sound effects with the given name.
      Specified by:
      removeSoundEffect in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the sound effect to remove.

      Parameters:

      public void playSoundEffect(String name, float vol)
      Plays a specific sound effect with the given volume.
      Specified by:
      playSoundEffect in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The sound effect to play.
      vol - The volume to play the sound effect at. Range: [0, 1]

      public boolean addMusicTrack(String name, String path)
      Adds a new music track to be played in the background on demand.
      Specified by:
      addMusicTrack in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the music track.
      path - The path of the music track. The system will first search class resources then the local disk.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • playMusicTrack

      public void playMusicTrack(String name)
      Plays a specific music track at 50% volume. This track will repeat until another track is called, or it is requested that music playback stops.
      Specified by:
      playMusicTrack in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the music track to play.

    • playMusicTrack

      public void playMusicTrack(String name, float vol)
      Plays a specific music track with the given volume. This track will repeat until another track is called, or it is requested that music playback stops.
      Specified by:
      playMusicTrack in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the music track to play.
      vol - The volume to play the music track at. Range: [0, 1]

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      Stops the currently playing music track without starting a new one.
      Specified by:
      stopMusic in interface SoundManager

    • addAmbienceEffect

      public boolean addAmbienceEffect(int interval, String name, String path)
      Adds a new ambience sound to be played in the background on an interval. Probability for the sound to play slowly increases until it's played at which point the probability becomes zero again.
      Specified by:
      addAmbienceEffect in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      interval - The interval after which the sound would have been played at least once. The time unit is the number of times ambienceSoundRoll is called.
      name - The name of the ambience sound.
      path - The path of the ambience sound. The system will first search class resources then the local disk.
      Returns:
      True if the ambience sound is found and then added to the SoundManager. Otherwise, false.

    • removeAmbienceEffect

      public void removeAmbienceEffect(String name)
      Removes ambience sounds with the given name.
      Specified by:
      removeAmbienceEffect in interface SoundManager
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ambience sound to remove.

    • ambienceSoundRoll

      public void ambienceSoundRoll()
      When called rolls the dice on whether any ambience sounds should be played or not.
      Specified by:
      ambienceSoundRoll in interface SoundManager
